name: The Graveyard Shift (Game Jam Team "404", donnok, HazardPlay13, Ronny Hammond, Kyla Ryan)
name_original: The Graveyard Shift (Game Jam Team "404", donnok, HazardPlay13, Ronny Hammond, Kyla Ryan)
description:
Game Description:

It is Halloween night and you, the pizza driver for Fiveinoes pizza, are tasked with delivering. The catch is that you only have five seconds per delivery. The company motto demands it! It’s do or die! Well more like do or become unemployed. With your boss on your ass and kids in costumes in the way you must make the delivery before time runs out.

GAME INSTRUCTIONS: Welcome to the Graveyard Shift! Your objective is to pick up pizzas and deliver them to the marked houses. To move you can use the WASD or ARROW KEYS. Once a pizza is delivered make sure to go back to the pizza shop to pick up a new order. Good luck and watch out for those pesky trick-or-treaters!

By "Team 404":

Engineering Team- Donnie Kubiak,  David Clark, Kyla Ryan

Art Team- Max Donaldson, Angel Reames, Danielle Hayward, Collin Pronovost

Game Design- David Clark, Kyla Ryan, Donnie Kubiak

Level Design- Nick Linkey, Kyla Ryan, Max Donaldson

Sound- David Clark

Writing Team- Ronny Hammond, Angel Reames, Nick Linkey, Max Donaldson

Production Team: Kyla Ryan, Ronny Hammond, Donnie Kubiak, David Clark
